ygData.subject: Re: Perma Frost
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen a few changes myself in perma. Things such as the preacher not having anything but money on him. Also I used to get chain and the odd piece of
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen a few changes myself in perma. Things such as the preacher not
having anything but money on him. Also I used to get chain and the odd
piece of bronze from gobbies now I rarely get anything besides some cash.
The arch and preacher do not spawn as often either. Also the preacher seems
to spawn on a regular basis with a FS warhammer now and nothing else on
him. Truly depressing.

At 10:55 AM 7/29/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>
>
>After the patch Ive notice a few changes in Permafrost on loot.
>
>I was in perma last night for 5 hours or so and only looted one bronze
>sword, usually we walk away with lots of rawhide armor and lots of FS
>weapons. Most all the weapons i looted last night were all Rusty, I am lvl
>24 and we were taking blues and whites and yellows.
>Also the archaelogist and the preacher never spawned while i was there.
>
>Anyone else see any difference?
>
>Twisterkahn Thunderstrike
>Tarew Marr
>
>
